example_guideline.description: This is the guideline used for testing with the Exotik Journeys lead (Switzerland & Amsterdam FIT)

basic_information.description: Standard guideline for Exotik Journeys FIT clients. Canada market expects premium service level with minimum 4-star accommodations.

accommodation.star_rating_note: Minimum 4-star. Can upgrade to 5-star if budget allows or customer requests.
accommodation.city_center_note: Canada market expects centrally located hotels. City center is strict unless customer specifies otherwise.
accommodation.hotel_brand_strategy_note: Prefer international chains (Marriott, Hilton, IHG, Radisson, NH Collection, Novotel, Movenpick). Local boutique acceptable if 4-star+ and well-reviewed.
accommodation.breakfast_note: Always include breakfast. Canada market expects this as standard.

meals_restaurants.note: FIT tours do not include meals beyond breakfast. Restaurants require minimum 8-10 paying guests.

transport_transfers.fit_train_priority_note: Use trains for journeys under 2-3 hours (e.g., Paris-Brussels, Zurich-Lucerne). Trains preferred over flights for short distances.
transport_transfers.fit_train_class_note: Canada market expects 1st class trains. Premium service level.
transport_transfers.fit_airport_transfers_note: Always private transfers for airport pickups/dropoffs. Shared transfers not acceptable for premium FIT clients.
transport_transfers.fit_sic_tours_note: SIC (seat-in-coach) tours acceptable for activities to keep costs reasonable, but private options should be mentioned as upgrades.

activities_tours.fit_activity_mix_note: Mix of SIC tours (cost-effective) and self-guided options (hop-on-hop-off, entrance tickets). Private tours as optional upgrades.
activities_tours.fit_hoho_note: Hop-on-hop-off tickets acceptable for flexible sightseeing in major cities (Paris, Rome, Barcelona, Amsterdam, etc.).
activities_tours.fit_optional_activities_note: Suggest optional activities with pricing. Let customer choose. Don't over-pack the itinerary.
activities_tours.activity_intensity_note: 2-3 activities per day maximum. Canada FIT clients want balance of structure and free time.
activities_tours.free_time_note: Evenings free, some full free days acceptable. Don't pack every day with tours.

commercial_parameters.margin_note: Canada market standard margin is 20%. This overrides agent default if different.
commercial_parameters.pricing_currency_note: Quote in EUR. Customer will convert to CAD on their end.
commercial_parameters.offer_format_note: FIT clients prefer itemized pricing for flexibility to add/remove services.
commercial_parameters.fit_non_refundable_note: Canada market expects standard cancellation terms. Non-refundable pricing only if customer explicitly requests aggressive pricing or last-minute booking.

business_logic_notes.quality_over_cost: Canada market prioritizes quality and service level over cost savings. When in doubt, choose higher quality option.
business_logic_notes.communication_style: Professional, responsive, detailed. Canada agents expect quick turnaround and clear communication.
business_logic_notes.flexibility: FIT clients expect flexibility. Provide options when possible (e.g., 2 hotel choices, optional activities).
business_logic_notes.lead_requirements_priority: CRITICAL: If lead specifies requirements (hotel names, budget, specific services), those ALWAYS override guideline defaults. Lead requirements = highest priority.

preferred_hotel_brands.note: Check if Exotik Journeys has preferred brands configured. If yes, prioritize those. If no, follow hotel_brand_strategy.

blacklisted_hotels.note: Check if Exotik Journeys has blacklisted hotels. Never select blacklisted properties.

typical_destinations.note: Exotik Journeys Canada clients typically request: Switzerland, Italy, France, Netherlands, Spain, UK, Germany. Multi-country itineraries common.

priority_hierarchy: 1. Lead parsing data (highest priority) - customer explicit requirements
ai_instructions.conflict_resolution: If lead specifies '5-star hotels' but guideline says '4-star', use 5-star from lead. If lead specifies hotel names, quote those specific hotels. If lead specifies budget, work within that budget even if it means adjusting star rating. Customer requirements always win.
ai_instructions.quote_generation_style: Professional, detailed, clear. Itemize services. Provide options when requested. Include terms and conditions. Mention optional activities separately with pricing.
